nodes.documentation: @dev Modifier to check if the sender is the owner of the fund
nodes.name: onlyOwner
createNewFund
contributeToFund
fundIdToName
fetchFundDetails
toggleContributionActive

contributeToFund(uint256).details: payable function that allows users to contribute to a fund

params._fundId: unique id to identify the fund in the mapping funds  whenNotPaused modifier from Pausable contract for implementing emergency stop pattern emits an event with the new balance*

params._benfitiaryAddress: benefitiary address of the fund emits an event with fundId*
params._fundHardCap: hard cap upper limit for the fund

fetchFundDetails(uint256).details: view function to get fund details using unqiue _fundId
fetchFundDetails(uint256).return: name , name of the fundbalance, hard cap upper limit for the fundfundHardCap, current balance fo the fundbenfitiaryAddress benefitiary address of the fund*

fundIdToName(uint256).details: get the name of the fund by using unique fundId

params._fundId: unique id to identify the fund in the mapping funds

pause().details: called by the owner to pause, triggers stopped state

paused().return: true if the contract is paused, false otherwise.

toggleContributionActive(uint256).details: Circuit breaker function to stop contribution to a  fund , can only be called by the  fund creator , sets the stopped flag to true and changes funds state to Closed

unpause().details: called by the owner to unpause, returns to normal state
